article.title: ATK Awarded $55 Million Advanced Anti-Radiation Guided Missile Low Rate Initial Production Contract by the United States Navy
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: ATK has received a $55 million Low Rate Initial Production (LRIP) contract from the U.S. Navy for the advanced anti-radiation guided missile (AARGM). The contract is for missiles, containers, spares, support/special test equipment and required production transition activities. Under terms of the contract, ATK will provide the weapon systems for use on Navy and Marine Corps F/A-18C/D aircraft.
